TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {5020=2009: Led pitching staff with 15 appearances ... made two starts ... limited opposition to a .265 batting average ... tossed two hitless innings in Lions' 15-8 win at Lamar ... threw 3 1/3 scoreless innings in two games at Cal State Northridge ... tossed a 1-2-3 inning with two strikeouts in home opener vs. St. John's ... made first collegiate start at Army, going three solid innings, allowing one run ... gained first collegiate win at Yale, allowing three earned runs over 4 2/3 innings ... pitched two scoreless innings with three strikeouts to earn the win at Rutgers., 4412=At Thayer Academy: Earned three letters in baseball and basketball ... captained both teams as a senior ... named All-ISL 2007, 2008 ... Patriot Ledger All-Scholastic as a junior and senior ... went 5-0 with 1.19 ERA and 46 strikeouts as a senior ... helped team to win 2008 ISL Championship outright for the first time in 17 years ... MVP of basketball team as a senior. Personal: Economics and Political Science major ... son of Marilyn and David Slutsky ... uncle, Alan Gallotta, played baseball and basketball at Brown ... uncle, Robert Berluti, played football and baseball at Tufts ... Harrison Maxwell Slutsky, b. June 16, 1990 in Boston.}
textBeforeTable: At Thayer Academy: Earned three letters in baseball and basketball ... captained both teams as a senior ... named All-ISL 2007, 2008 ... Patriot Ledger All-Scholastic as a junior and senior ... went 5-0 with 1.19 ERA and 46 strikeouts as a senior ... helped team to win 2008 ISL Championship outright for the first time in 17 years ... MVP of basketball team as a senior. Personal: Economics and Political Science major ... son of Marilyn and David Slutsky ... uncle, Alan Gallotta, played baseball and basketball at Brown ... uncle, Robert Berluti, played football and baseball at Tufts ... Harrison Maxwell Slutsky, b. June 16, 1990 in Boston. 2009: Led pitching staff with 15 appearances ... made two starts ... limited opposition to a .265 batting average ... tossed two hitless innings in Lions' 15-8 win at Lamar ... threw 3 1/3 scoreless innings in two games at Cal State Northridge ... tossed a 1-2-3 inning with two strikeouts in home opener vs. St. John's ... made first collegiate start at Army, going three solid innings, allowing one run ... gained first collegiate win at Yale, allowing three earned runs over 4 2/3 innings ... pitched two scoreless innings with three strikeouts to earn the win at Rutgers. 2010: Made 11 appearances on the hill ... started four times ... struck out three in two spotless innings to start Columbia's 9-0 combined shutout of St. Peter's ... allowed one earned run in two
textAfterTable: Position: Right-Handed Pitcher Height: 6'2" Weight: 180 Year: Senior Hometown: Canton, Mass. High School: Thayer Academy Harrison Photos: > View Gallery Harrison Videos: > More Videos
